author: Special Correspondent
text:
The students of the Excel Group of Institutions here donated 430 units of blood at two separate voluntary blood donation camps organised by the Rotaract Clubs of these institutions recently. The blood donation camps were conducted under the “Mahadan” project of the Rotaract Movement.

It was also an attempt to set Limca Book of World Records in collecting more units of blood from student donors.

The first camp was sponsored by Rotary Club of Komarapalayam.

A total of 178 students of Excel College of Engineering and Technology donated blood to Rainbow Blood Bank, Karur. In the second camp organised jointly by the Rotaract Clubs of Excel Engineering College, Excel College of Engineering and Technology, Excel Education City, Excel Polytechnic College, Excel College of Architecture and Planning, Excel and Kandhaswamy Colleges of Education, 252 units of blood was collected.

Manikandan, former district Rotaract Representative, E. Palaniswamy, Principal, Excel College of Engineering and Technology, K. V. S. Manian, president, Rotary Club of Komarapalayam and others felicitated the donors.
title: Blood donation camps held
